DOC.brief_summary: This single site , prospective , non-blinded , non-randomized , non-interventional study design evaluate effect change alveolar minute ventilation measurement respiratory heat loss ( enthalpy ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Alveolar Minute Ventilation Respiratory Gas Heat Content
DOC.criteria: age great 18 year schedule elective surgical procedure anticipate duration 2 hour require general anesthesia positive pressure ventilation use endotracheal tube patient status ASA 1 , 2 3 significant cardiovascular respiratory disease supine surgical position Adults unable give primary consent age le 18 year pregnancy prisoner preexist cardiac pulmonary disease infusion inotropic drug positive end expiratory pressure ( PEEP ) requirement > 8 cm H2O increase intraabdominal pressure ( e.g . plan surgical pneumoperitoneum ascitis ) intraoperative patient position supine
